kpi_info.title: Mean Location Update Duration
kpi_info.use: Indicates the mean duration of Location Update procedure
kpi_info.use_experience:
Counter MEAN_LU_DURATION unit is hundredths of seconds.

Multiplication by 10 is necessary for the values to be provided in milliseconds.
PUBLISHED: M14.3
LAST UPDATE: 31-07-2009
THEORETICAL SUMMARY LEVELS: MSC

RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: MSC

KPI CLASS: Mobility
MEASUREMENT(S): VLR measurement , part one (M82/52H)

NOTES: This NSN KPI is compliant with ex-S "Mean Location Update Duration" KPI
